00062 #define  LED_PORT       PORTD
00063 #define  LED_DDR        DDRD
00064 #define  LED_PIN        PIND
00065                     
00066 #define  LED0_BIT       PIND5
00067 #define  LED1_BIT       PIND6
00068 #define  LED2_BIT       PIND7
00069         
00070 #define  Leds_init()    (LED_DDR  |=  (1<<LED0_BIT) | (1<<LED1_BIT) | (1<<LED2_BIT))
00071 #define  Leds_on()      (LED_PORT |=  (1<<LED0_BIT) | (1<<LED1_BIT) | (1<<LED2_BIT))
00072 #define  Leds_off()     (LED_PORT &= ~((1<<LED0_BIT) | (1<<LED1_BIT) | (1<<LED2_BIT)))
00073 #define  Leds_set_val(val) (Leds_off(),LED_PORT |= (val<<5)&((1<<LED0_BIT) | (1<<LED1_BIT) | (1<<LED2_BIT)))
00074 #define  Leds_get_val()    (LED_PORT>>5)
00075 
00076 
00077 #define  Led0_on()      (LED_PORT |= (1<<LED0_BIT))
00078 #define  Led1_on()      (LED_PORT |= (1<<LED1_BIT))
00079 #define  Led2_on()      (LED_PORT |= (1<<LED2_BIT))
00080         
00081 #define  Led0_off()     (LED_PORT &= ~(1<<LED0_BIT))
00082 #define  Led1_off()     (LED_PORT &= ~(1<<LED1_BIT))
00083 #define  Led2_off()     (LED_PORT &= ~(1<<LED2_BIT))
00084         
00085 #define  Led0_toggle()  (LED_PIN |= (1<<LED0_BIT))
00086 #define  Led1_toggle()  (LED_PIN |= (1<<LED1_BIT))
00087 #define  Led2_toggle()  (LED_PIN |= (1<<LED2_BIT))
00088         
00089 #define  Is_led0_on()   (LED_PIN & (1<<LED0_BIT) ? TRUE : FALSE)
00090 #define  Is_led1_on()   (LED_PIN & (1<<LED1_BIT) ? TRUE : FALSE)
00091 #define  Is_led2_on()   (LED_PIN & (1<<LED2_BIT) ? TRUE : FALSE)
00093 
00098 #define  Joy_init()           {DDRC &= ~0x40; PORTC |= 0x40; if(!Is_JTAG_enable()) {DDRF &= ~0xF0; PORTF |= 0xF0;}}
00099 #define  Is_joy_right()       (Is_JTAG_enable() || (PINF & (1<<PINF7)) ?  FALSE : TRUE)
00100 #define  Is_joy_not_right()   ((!Is_JTAG_enable()) && (PINF & (1<<PINF7)) ?  TRUE : FALSE)
00101 #define  Is_joy_select()      (Is_JTAG_enable() || (PINF & (1<<PINF6)) ?  FALSE : TRUE)
00102 #define  Is_joy_not_select()  ((!Is_JTAG_enable()) && (PINF & (1<<PINF6)) ?  TRUE : FALSE)
00103 #define  Is_joy_up()          (Is_JTAG_enable() || (PINF & (1<<PINF5)) ?  FALSE : TRUE)
00104 #define  Is_joy_not_up()      ((!Is_JTAG_enable()) && (PINF & (1<<PINF5)) ?  TRUE  : FALSE)
00105 #define  Is_joy_left()        (Is_JTAG_enable() || (PINF & (1<<PINF4)) ?  FALSE : TRUE)
00106 #define  Is_joy_not_left()    ((!Is_JTAG_enable()) && (PINF & (1<<PINF4)) ?  TRUE : FALSE)
00107 #define  Is_joy_down()        ((PINC & (1<<PINC6)) ?  FALSE : TRUE)
00108 #define  Is_joy_not_down()    ((PINC & (1<<PINC6)) ?  TRUE : FALSE)
00109 
00111 #define  Switches_enable_it()
00112 
00114 #define  Switches_disable_it()
00116 
00117 
00122 #define  Hwb_button_init()    (DDRE  &= ~(1<<PINE2), PORTE |= (1<<PINE2))
00123 #define  Is_hwb()             ((PINE &   (1<<PINE2)) ?  FALSE : TRUE)
00124 #define  Is_not_hwb()         ((PINE &   (1<<PINE2)) ?  TRUE : FALSE)

00129 #define  Enable_buck_pwm()     Timerhs_enable_pwm_a()

00136 #define  ADC_TEMP_CH           0x00 // Enable Single Ended Input on ADC0 pin

00184 
00185 #define DF_4_MB   // Type of DF implemented on evk527.
00186 
00187 
00188 #define DF_SELECT_MEM        0
00189 #define DF_UNSELECT_MEM      1
00190 #define DF_NB_MEM            1
00191 
00192 #ifndef __GNUC__
00193    // PORTB_Bit0=1,DDRB_Bit0=0: SPI Slave Select Input. The data direction of the
00194    //    NOT(SS) is INPUT and the pull-up resistor is activated.
00195    // DDRB_Bit1=1: the SCK signal direction is OUTPUT.
00196    // DDRB_Bit2=1: the SI signal direction is OUTPUT.
00197    // DDRB_Bit3=0: the SO signal direction is INPUT.
00198    // PORTB_Bit4=1,DDRB_Bit4=1: CS driven high
00199    //    and both CS are OUTPUT.
00200 
00201    
00202    #define DF_CS_PIN          PORTE_Bit6
00203    #define Init_df_evk527()   (DDRB_Bit0=1,PORTB_Bit0=1,DF_CS_PIN=1,DDRE|=0x40)
00204    #define DF_CS0             DF_CS_PIN
00205    #define DF_CS1             DF_CS0
00206    #define DF_CS2             DF_CS0
00207    #define DF_CS3             DF_CS0
00208    #define Df_select_df(i, val) (DF_CS##i = val)
00209    #define Df_desel_all()       (DF_CS0=DF_UNSELECT_MEM)     // set CS# dataflash memories
00210 #else 
00211    #define Init_df_evk527()   (PORTB|=0x01,DDRB &= 0xFE,\
00212                            DDRB|=0x01,DDRB|=0x04,DDRB|=0x04,DF_CS_PORT|=(1<<DF_CS0),DDRE|=0x40)
00213    #define DF_CS_PORT         PORTE
00214    #define DF_CS0             6
00215    #define DF_CS1             DF_CS0
00216    #define DF_CS2             DF_CS0
00217    #define DF_CS3             DF_CS0
00218    #define Df_desel_all()     (DF_CS_PORT|=(1<<DF_CS0)) // set CS# dataflash memories (unselect).
00219 #endif
00220 #define df_init_spi()      Init_df_evk527()
00222    
00226 #define   MMC_io_init()             (DDRB &= 0xF7, DDRB |= 0x07, PORTB |= 0x09)
00227 #ifndef   __GNUC__
00228   #define   MMC_CS_LINE             PORTB_Bit0
00229 #endif
00230 
00231 #define   MMC_CS_PORT               PORTB   // port
00232 #define   MMC_CS_PIN                0x00    // offset
00233 #define   Mmc_sd_select()           (MMC_CS_PORT &= ~(1<<MMC_CS_PIN))
00234 #define   Mmc_sd_unselect()         (MMC_CS_PORT |= (1<<MMC_CS_PIN))
00237 
00238 #endif   // TARGET_BOARD==EVK527

00240 #endif  // EVK_527_H
